docs.lead_paragraph: Last week, Room for Debate published a discussion on "The 40-Something Dependent Child." Readers responded with their own thoughts on why it has been increasingly difficult for younger generations to support themselves without family help.

headline.main: Dependent Adults: Victims or Spoiled Brats?

docs.abstract: First-hand tales from parents, grown-up children, teachers and others on the financial crutch of Mom and Dad.
docs.snippet: First-hand tales from parents, grown-up children, teachers and others on the financial crutch of Mom and Dad.

docs.lead_paragraph: Also, officials announced that nearly 25 million doses of swine flu vaccine are now available, and many vaccination clinics are expected to be held this weekend.

headline.main: Swine Flu Hit Millions in Spring, Agency Says
headline.print_headline: Swine Flu Hit Millions In Spring, Agency Says

docs.snippet: Also, officials announced that nearly 25 million doses of swine flu vaccine are now available, and many vaccination clinics are expected to be held this weekend.

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations
